object.name: system
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="link_to_company_website" type="zope.schema.URI"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Link To Website</title> </field> <field name="contact_info" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Contact information of department that supports the tool (if applicable)</description> <required>False</required> <title>Contact Info</title> </field> <field name="aps_system_technology" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Technology</title> <values> <element>Website</element> <element>Mobile app</element> <element>Hardware</element> <element>Software</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_system_grades" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Grade(s)</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>K</element> <element>1</element> <element>2</element> <element>3</element> <element>4</element> <element>5</element> <element>6</element> <element>7</element> <element>8</element> <element>9</element> <element>10</element> <element>11</element> <element>12</element> <element>Early Childhood</element> <element>Elementary</element> <element>Middle</element> <element>High</element> <element>K-12</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="aps_system_status" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>APS</title> <values> <element>Supported</element> <element>Approved</element> <element>Approved with Cautions</element> <element>Pilot</element> <element>Not Approved</element> <element>Pending</element> <element>Not Applicable</element> <element>Not Evaluated</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_system_ferpa" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>FERPA</title> <values> <element>Approved</element> <element>Parent Consent Required</element> <element>Not Applicable</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_system_cost" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Cost</title> <values> <element>Free</element> <element>Paid</element> <element>District Purchased</element> <element>Unknown</element> <element>Mixed</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_system_language" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Language</title> <values> <element>English</element> <element>Spanish</element> <element>Vietnamese</element> <element>Chinese</element> <element>Korean</element> <element>Arabic</element> <element>Farsi</element> <element>Albanian</element> <element>Somali</element> <element>Swahili</element> <element>French</element> <element>German</element> <element>Italian</element> <element>Other</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_system_support_information" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Support Information</title> </field> <field name="aps_system_requirements" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>System Requirements</title> </field> <field name="aps_system_login_information" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Login Information</title> </field> <field name="aps_accessible" form:after="*" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description/> <title>This content is accessible</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> </schema> </model>
